name: Leap into the hole
description:
In 2050, human beings lost the energy from the sun.

The sun is hiden in the cube-hole.

Luckily,a scientist find a way to get the energy from the hole. He created a device which is able to get the energy of the sun and translate it to human beings.

Now what we can do is rolling the device into the hole.

OK!

Let's save ourselves.
